Class TimeSpanUtils

    Some utility functions used by various TimeSeries classes to get arrays of spans of time

      • getTime

        public static long[] getTime(long begin,
             long end,
             int splits)
        Parameters:
        begin -
        end -
        splits -
        Returns:
        longs starting from begin and less than end such that "splits" times are returned and delta between the times is (end-begin)/(splits-1)
